author: m.kalinin
content: I didn't get your point. PoS has been announced before Mainnet launch back in 2014, it took us a while to get to a point where upgrade to PoS is nearly scheduled, and I don't see a world where miners securing the network without this process being profitable. Profit can be the only predictable reason why miners are securing the network, any other reasons, like good relationships in the past, are pretty much unlikely to take place, thus, taking any other reason into account would be unreliable.
